messages.InterviewCard.cardText: Unlock your potential and embark on a fulfilling professional journey with Intelligent Interview Prep
messages.InterviewCard.requestButton: Sign up for a mock interview
messages.JobInfo.hi: Hi, {name}! Let's help you prepare for your job search
messages.JobInfo.companyMessage: First type the name of the company you want to apply to
messages.JobInfo.information: Welcome to the your Practice Interview. Please enter a company name and a position. We will use this information to generate mock interview questions.
messages.Interview.interviewNotes: Interview notes for your desired role
messages.Interview.nextQuestion:
Okay, here is the second question: 

**{question}**
messages.Interview.yesAnotherQuestionChip: Yes, I would like a question
messages.Interview.noMoreQuestionsChip: No, I am done for now
messages.Interview.yesAdvisor: Yes, I would like to get coaching from my advisor
messages.Interview.noAdvisor: no, I am good for now
